document_name: Law No. 19.158 creating the Uruguay Institute of Meterology
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/URY/2013/URY-2013-10-25-Law No. 19.158 creating the Uruguay Institute of Meterology_f1a7e455b58fe03887232f02281dee9c.pdf
document_description: Tasks the Institute with providing technical and scientific advice to the Executive Branch on issues related to climate change.
